name: rhinologist
content:

a doctor who specializes in treating diseases and problems of the nose : Rhinologists are experts in endoscopic sinus surgery. A considerable number of the patients seen by the rhinologist have allergic rhinitis.
More examplesFewer examplesRhinologists treat patients medically and surgically depending on the nature of the disease.Endoscopic advances have provided rhinologists with excellent imaging.As any rhinologist would tell you, the key to reducing the chance of recurrence is determined by finding the origin of the lesion and clearing the site of any residual cells.
